features: 60 ready-to-upload cover images; High resolution (3000x1200 px) JPGs; A clean and cohesive aesthetic; Click "I want this" and complete the checkout process; You'll receive a downloadable zip folder containing the cover images; Open the zip folder, choose a cover and upload it to your Notion page — for more detailed instructions:how to add custom cover images to your Notion pages; Click "Reposition" to adjust the cover positioning to your liking
